analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/27/0x194ec0bb82886ca552a654f19cdea338ce42b3ac.sol:
	Contract HBL has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/27/0x194ec0bb82886ca552a654f19cdea338ce42b3ac.sol#292)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/27/0x194ec0bb82886ca552a654f19cdea338ce42b3ac.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/27/0x194ec0bb82886ca552a654f19cdea338ce42b3ac.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/27/0x194ec0bb82886ca552a654f19cdea338ce42b3ac.sol#71-72) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of HBL.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/27/0x194ec0bb82886ca552a654f19cdea338ce42b3ac.sol#225) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addedValue' of HBL.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/27/0x194ec0bb82886ca552a654f19cdea338ce42b3ac.sol#225-226) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of HBL.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/27/0x194ec0bb82886ca552a654f19cdea338ce42b3ac.sol#233-234) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_subtractedValue' of HBL.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/27/0x194ec0bb82886ca552a654f19cdea338ce42b3ac.sol#234-235) is not in mixedCase
